ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.common

Class Preconditions

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.common.Preconditions

  • public class Preconditions
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class containing static utility methods for asserting certain preconditions. Created by rishi on 15-10-30.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • checkNotNull

        public static <T> T checkNotNull(T obj,
                                 java.lang.String argumentName)
                          throws ArgumentNullException
        Checks if the object passed is null or not. If null, then throws ArgumentNullException. This should be ideally used in the beginning of a method.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type of the object being checked.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to be checked.
        argumentName - The name of the argument (of the original method) that this object corresponds to.
        Returns:
        The passed object itself.
        Throws:
        ArgumentNullException - Thrown, if the object is null.

      • checkNotNullOrEmpty

        public static <T extends java.util.Collection<?>> T checkNotNullOrEmpty(T obj,
                                                                        java.lang.String argumentName)
                                                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks if the collection passed is null or not, and if it is not null, then if it is empty. If null, then throws ArgumentNullException. If empty, throws IllegalArgumentException. This should be ideally used in the beginning of a method.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type of the object being checked.
        Parameters:
        obj - The collection object to be checked.
        argumentName - The name of the argument (of the original method) that this object corresponds to.
        Returns:
        The passed object itself.
        Throws:
        ArgumentNullException - Thrown, if the collection is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown, if the collection is empty.

      • checkNotNullOrWhitespace

        public static java.lang.String checkNotNullOrWhitespace(java.lang.String str,
                                                        java.lang.String argumentName)
                                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks if the passed string is null and/or whitespace. If it's null, then throws ArgumentNullException. if it's whitespace, then throws IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        str - The string to be checked.
        argumentName - The name of the argument (of the original method) that this object corresponds to.
        Returns:
        The passed string.
        Throws:
        ArgumentNullException - Thrown, if the string is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown, if the string is whitespace.
